extensionDescription.message: Connect to a range of Mullvad proxies without manual configuration.

notificationConnectionFailedTitle.description: Title for notification if proxy connection fails.

notificationConnectionFailedMessage.description: Message body for notification if proxy connection fails.

notificationConnectionFailedMessageNonMu.description: Message body for notification if proxy connection fails because client is not connected to Mullvad network.

notificationConnectionSucceededTitle.description: Title for notification if proxy connection succeeds.

notificationConnectionSucceededMessage.description: Message body for notification if proxy connection succeeds.

notificationConnectionDisconnectedTitle.description: Title for notification when proxy is disconnected.

notificationConnectionDisconnectedMessag.description: Message body for notification when proxy is disconnected.

popupLoading.description: Displayed in place of content whilst loading.

popupConnectionStatusConnected.description: Connection status displayed whilst connected to a proxy server.

popupConnectionStatusConnecting.description: Connection status displayed whilst connecting to a proxy.

popupConnectionStatusNotConnected.description: Connection status displayed whilst not connected to a proxy server.

popupConnectionTypeWireGuard.description: Title text for connection info item.

popupConnectionTypeOpenVPN.description: Title text for connection info item.

popupSelectionCountryPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for country combo box.

popupSelectionServerPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for server combo box.

popupConnect.description: Proxy server connect button (only displayed whilst not connected via WireGuard) text.

optionsPanelViewInTab.description: Popup options panel header tab button

optionsPanelClose.description: Popup options panel header close button

optionsAutoConnectDescription.message: When the extension is first loaded, connect automatically to either the current region's proxy or the last remembered connected server (if enabled).

optionsEnableQuickConnectDescription.message: Immediately connect to a server when it's selected.

optionsRememberConnectedServerDescriptio.message: Restore proxy settings after browser/extension restarts.

optionsProxyDnsDescription.message: Hide system DNS servers by resolving DNS queries on the proxy server.

optionsEnableNotificationsDescription.message: Show notifications when the connection state changes or if a connection error occurs.

optionsEnableNotificationsOnlyErrorsLabe.description: Enable only error notifications option label.

optionsEnableIpv6LookupsDescription.message: Make additional API request to display public IPv6 address.

optionsEnableDebugInfoDescription.message: Show additional connection info and output more detailed logs.

optionsExcludeListDescription.message: List of newline-delimited hosts for URLs to exclude from proxied requests.

optionsClearCacheLabel.description: Label for button that clears API cache

optionsClearRecentServersLabel.description: Label for button that clears API cache
